item.title: Working on multiple Git branches in parallel
item.description: Introduction When working on a project, many times we have to switch to a different branch to help a colleague, fix a bug, or to work on another feature (because of a change in priorities or blocks). In these situations, we have some options: Clone again to another folder: This was the option that I used up until some time ago, but if you are working on a big code base, it may take some time to download the remote repository and it will use more space in the disk because you will end up with one copy of the repository for each branch;
